components/csd/products/sizes-list: {{!-- First check if there is an Availability field --}} {{#if (merge settings csd_has_custom_field_availability=0)}}{{/if}} {{#each custom_fields}} {{#if name '==' 'Availability'}} {{#if (merge ../../settings csd_has_custom_field_availability=1)}}{{/if}} {{value}} {{/if}} {{/each}} {{!-- If no Availability field provided, then compile sizes out of the sizes custom fields --}} {{#if settings.csd_has_custom_field_availability '===' 0}} {{#each custom_fields}} {{> components/csd/products/sizes-list-item}} {{/each}} {{/if}}
